get.description: Gets a specific artifact for a pipeline

data.description: The type-specific resource data. For example, "#/10002/5/drop", "$/drops/5", "\\myshare\myfolder\mydrops\5"

downloadUri.description: Link to the resource. This might include things like query parameters to download as a zip file

type.description: The type of the resource: File container, version control folder, UNC path, etc.

artifactAlias.description: Artifact source alias for Artifact Source trigger type

hasStarted.description: The time at which the deployment started, and null if it has not been deployed yet

concurrencyCount.description: This policy decides, how many environments would be with Environment Runner.

queueDepthCount.description: Queue depth in the EnvironmentQueue table, this table keeps the environment entries till Environment Runner is free [as per it's policy] to take another environment for running.

jobId.description: Team Foundation Job Definition Job Id

scheduleDays.description: Days of the week to pipeline

startHours.description: Local time zone hour to start

startMinutes.description: Local time zone minute to start

timeZoneId.description: Time zone Id of release schedule, such as 'UTC'

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

schedule.description: Release schedule for Scheduled Release trigger type

api-Version.name: api-version
api-Version.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '3.2-preview' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

externalDocs.description: Visual Studio Team Services REST APIs
